subtitle: Ichimoku Cloud — multi‑line trend and support/resistance system.

measures.how_to_read: Price above cloud = bullish; below = bearish; crosses of Tenkan/Kijun add signals.
measures.caveats: Complex; ensure users understand line meanings before acting.

assistant_hints: Wait for closes relative to the cloud to reduce noise.
Confirm with higher timeframe trend to avoid whipsaws.
Use Tenkan/Kijun crosses as context, not sole triggers.
Combine with EMA/MACD for clarity if new to Ichimoku.
beginner_summary: Ichimoku Cloud — multi‑line trend and support/resistance system.
